dimsums.title: Har Gow
dimsums.blurb: Main ingredients：Wheat starch, tapioca starch, shrimp, cooked pork fat, bamboo shoots, scallions, cornstarch, sesame oil, soy sauce, sugar, and other seasonings

dimsums.title: Shumai
dimsums.blurb: Main ingredients：Seasoned ground pork, whole and chopped mutton, Chinese black mushroom, lye water dough

example_prose.value: This is an example of a multi-paragraph intro formatted in a Google Doc to be used for ArchieML. What is said here is not that important, but the structure of this text in the Google Doc is.
This is the second paragraph of the text to show how to loop over the text.
# this is a list embedded in the text

example_image.value: This is another freeform array of text with multiple paragraphs but in this case there is an image call between two paragraphs of the text.
This is the second graph of text. The image above will be placed between the two graphs using an image macro in the processors.njk file.
